quote: To be in your children's memories tomorrow,You have to be in their lives today.
“It is easier to build stronger children than to repair broken men”
“Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.”
“What it's like to be a parent: It's one of the hardest things you'll ever do but in exchange it teaches you the meaning of unconditional love.”
“There really are places in the heart you don't even know exist until you love a child.”
“Character is what you have left when you've lost everything you can lose”
“No occupation in this world is more trying to soul and body than the care of young children..”
“Your children need your presence more than your presents.”
“Parents can tell but never teach, unless they practice what they preach.”
“At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.”
“Always kiss your children goodnight, even if they're already asleep.”
“I regret not having had more time with my kids when they were growing up.”
“To be in your children's memories tomorrow, you have to be in their lives today.”
“Everything depends on upbringing”
“We never know the love of the parent till we become parents ourselves”
“To bring up a child in the way he should go - travel that way yourself”
“Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.”
“Don’t worry that children never listen to you; worry that they are always watching you.”
“Treat a child as though he already is the person he’s capable of becoming.”
“If you want your children to improve, let them overhear the nice things you say about them to others.”
“A child’s mind is not a container to be filled but rather a fire to be kindled.”
